statements: DELETE FROM ad_targeting WHERE user_id = 123 AND ad_id = 456;
DELETE FROM ad_targeting WHERE ad_clicks > 100 AND behavior_data LIKE '%special%';
DELETE FROM ad_targeting WHERE ad_id = 100 AND ad_clicks >= 50;
DELETE FROM ad_targeting WHERE behavior_data LIKE '%shopping%' AND ad_category = 'electronics';
DELETE FROM ad_data WHERE ad_category = 'Electronics' AND ad_clicks > 1000;
DELETE FROM user_behavior_data WHERE user_id = 123 AND behavior_type = 'click';
DELETE FROM ads_targeting WHERE target_age_lower = 18 AND target_gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM user_location WHERE country='USA' AND city='New York';
DELETE FROM user_behavior WHERE user_id=100 AND click_count>5;
